aboutMarito.intro: Igama elithi 'Marito' livela ku-Xitsonga, elithetha 'amagama' okanye 'amagama'. Le yinkqubo yewebhu ehambele phambili edibanisa umsantsa phakathi kolifa oltyebileyo lolwimi loMzantsi Afrika kunye nokufikeleleka kwedijithali yanamhlanje. Abathandi beelwimi, abaphandi be-NLP, kunye neengcali zeelwimi banokusebenzisa iMarito njengeqonga elimanyeneyo ukuze baphonononge, bafake isandla, kwaye bagcine izichazi-magama ezininzi, izichazi-magama, kunye neebhanki zamagama kwiilwimi ezili-11 ezisemthethweni zoMzantsi Afrika.
aboutMarito.mission: IMarito isebenza ngokugqibeleleyo kokubini kwi-intanethi nangaphandle kwe-intanethi, inika amandla uluntu ukuba lufumane izixhobo zeelwimi ezipheleleyo, lunikeze ingxelo, kwaye lusebenzisane ekwakheni ii-lexicons ezomeleleyo kwiilwimi ezinezixhobo ezincinane. Le qonga yinxalenye yephulo eliqhubekayo le-DSFSI (iNzululwazi yeDatha yeMpembelelo yeNtlalo) kwiYunivesithi yasePretoria ukwenza izixhobo zeelwimi zifumaneke luluntu lonke kwaye zikhuthaze uphando lokusetyenziswa kolwimi lwendalo kwiilwimi zaseAfrika.

aboutMofoko.title: Malunga neMafoko
aboutMofoko.content: IMafoko (elithetha “amagama” ngesiTswana) liqonga leelwimi ezininzi eliyilwe ukuze libhiyozelwe kwaye lidibanise iilwimi ezili-11 ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika.

whyMafoko.title: Kutheni iMafoko ikhona
whyMafoko.content: Iilwimi zaseMzantsi Afrika zinegazi, ziyachaza, kwaye zinxulumene kakhulu nesazisi sethu, kodwa uninzi lwazo alusabonwa ngokwaneleyo kwihlabathi ledijithali. IMafoko yakhiwe ukuze itshintshe loo meko. Idibanisa amagama neentsingiselo ezivela kwiiglosari ezininzi ibe yindawo enye enokukhangelwa lula, nto leyo eyenza kube lula ngakumbi ukufumana amagama, ukuqonda iinguqulelo, nokufunda kuzo zonke iilwimi ezili-11 ezisemthethweni.
whyMafoko.content2: Nokuba usekwi-intanethi okanye awukho kuyo, iMafoko igcina ulwazi ngeelwimi lufikeleleka. Ikhuthaza nokusebenzisana ngokuvumela uluntu ukuba luphakamise uhlaziyo, lwabelane ngolwazi, kwaye luncede ekuphuculeni umgangatho wokungena kwiglosa nganye ngokuhamba kwexesha.
whyMafoko.content3: Ngokudibanisa izixhobo zolwimi ezazisachithakele zibe liqonga elinye eliphilayo nelikhulayo, iMafoko inceda ekugcineni ilifa lethu ngelixa ixhasa imfundo ebandakanya wonke umntu kunye nophando ngeelwimi zendalo zeelwimi ezineziseko ezilinganiselweyo.

whoMafoko.title: Ngubani oyenzelwe yona
whoMafoko.content: Abafundi, ootitshala, abaphandi, kunye nabani na onothando ngolwimi nenkcubeko.

howMafoko.title: Indlela yokusebenzisa iMafoko
howMafoko.content: Ungasebenzisa iMafoko ukukhangela amagama, uhlolisise iindawo zolwimi ezahlukeneyo, ubone iinguqulelo, kwaye wabelane ngengxelo yakho ukunceda ukuphucula iqonga.
howMafoko.help: Ukuze ufumane inkcazelo eneenkcukacha ebandakanya izikhokelo ezimfutshane kunye nevidiyo zokubonisa, nceda undwendwele

behindProject.title: Ngasemva kweProjekthi
behindProject.content: IMafoko iphuhliselwe iqela leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) kwiYunivesithi yasePitoli.

termsAndConditions.title: Imiqathango Nemigaqo
termsAndConditions.welcome: Wamkelekile eMafoko, iqonga leelwimi ezininzi eliphuhliswe nelilawulwa liqela leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) kwiYunivesithi yasePitoli. Ngokusebenzisa iMafoko, uyavuma nale Miqathango nemigaqo. Nceda uyifunde ngononophelo phambi kokuba ufikelele okanye unikele iqhaza kweli qonga.
termsAndConditions.purpose: IMafoko (elithetha ukuba “amagama” ngesiTswana) liqonga lemfundo elingajonganga nzuzo elikhuthaza iilwimi ezisemthethweni ezilishumi elinanye zaseMzantsi Afrika ngokubonelela ngamathuba okufikelela kwiiglosa ezininzi kunye neenkqubo zolwimi. Eli qonga lenzelwe ukuxhasa imfundo ebandakanya wonke umntu, uphando, kunye nentsebenziswano phakathi koluntu lweelwimi.
termsAndConditions.user: Ukuze unikele iqhaza eMafoko, njengokungenisa amagama, ukuvota, ukuphawula, okanye ukufaka isicelo sokuba yingcali yolwimi, abasebenzisi kufuneka benze iakhawunti. Uyavuma ukubonelela ngolwazi oluchanekileyo noluthembekileyo xa ubhalisa kwaye ugcine iinkcukacha zakho zokungena ziyimfihlo. I-DSFSI inelungelo lokumisa okanye ukususa iiakhawunti ezophula le miqathango okanye ezithumela umxholo ongafanelekanga.
termsAndConditions.contribution: IMafoko ivumela abasebenzisi ukuba bafake amagama, iinguqulelo, iinkcazo, kunye nezimvo. Ngokunikela ngomxholo, unika i-DSFSI ilayisensi engeyoyodwa, engahlawulwayo yokubonisa, ukuvelisa kwakhona, nokusasaza igalelo lakho ngaphakathi eMafoko ngenjongo yemfundo nophando.
termsAndConditions.contribution2: Zonke iziphumo kufuneka zibe ezifanelekileyo, ezihloniphekileyo, nezilungiselelwe ulwimi. Umxholo onobandlululo, ongahloneliyo okanye okhohlisayo uya kususwa, kwaye ukuphindwa kwetyala kungakhokelela ekumiselweni kweakhawunti.
termsAndConditions.linguist: Abasebenzisi abafuna ukuba ziingcali zolwimi kweli qonga banokufaka izicelo ngokubonelela ngobungqina bezincwadi zabo zophando (ezifana neerekhodi zeGoogle Scholar). I-DSFSI inelungelo lokuhlola nokungqina ubunyani beeziqinisekiso phambi kokunika amalungelo engcali yolwimi.
termsAndConditions.property: Iqonga leMafoko, eliquka uyilo lwayo, isakhiwo, kunye neglosa eziqokelelweyo, liyimpahla yobukrelekrele ye-DSFSI kunye neYunivesithi yasePitoli. Amagama kunye neenguqulelo nganye ziseselempahla yababhali nababoneleli bazo, kodwa zingasetyenziswa kwakhona ngaphakathi eMafoko ngenjongo yemfundo nophando njengoko kuchaziwe apha ngasentla.
termsAndConditions.accuracy: Nangona iMafoko ijolise ekuboneleleni ngolwazi lweelwimi olunembileyo noluthembekileyo, i-DSFSI ayinakuqinisekisa ngokupheleleyo ngokugqibeleleyo okanye ngochaneko lomxholo. Eli qonga linikezelwa 'njengoko linjalo' ngenjongo yemfundo, kwaye i-DSFSI ayinaxanduva ngalo naluphi na uhlobo lweempazamo, ukushiywa, okanye iziphumo ezivelayo ekusebenzisweni kwalo.
termsAndConditions.commercial: IMafoko inikezelwa simahla ngenjongo yemfundo nophando. Akukho mxholo okwiqonga onokuvuselelwa, usasazwe, okanye usetyenziswe ngenjongo yorhwebo ngaphandle kwemvume ebhaliweyo evela kwi-DSFSI.
termsAndConditions.privacy: IMafoko ayisebenzisi ii-cookie, ukulandela umkhondo wedatha, okanye iinkonzo zokuthengisa. Ulwazi lweakhawunti lugcinwa kuphela ukuze luvumele ukuthatha inxaxheba komsebenzisi kunye nokugcina ukusebenza kweqonga. I-DSFSI ayabelani ngedatha yabucala namaqela angaphandle.
termsAndConditions.change: I-DSFSI inokuba ihlaziye le Miqathango nemigaqo ngamaxesha athile ukubonisa uphuculo okanye utshintsho lwemigaqo-nkqubo. Ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa iMafoko emva kotshintsho kuthetha ukuba uyamkela imiqathango ehlaziyiweyo.
termsAndConditions.contact: Ngemibuzo okanye inkxalabo ephathelele kule Miqathango nemigaqo, nceda uqhagamshelane neqela leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) kwiYunivesithi yasePitoli.

feedbackPage.description: Yabelana ngezimvo zakho ukusinceda siphucule inkonzo yethu.
feedbackPage.description2: Sazise ukuba yintoni engahambanga kakuhle ukuze sikwazi ukuyilungisa.
feedbackPage.description3: Singathanda ukuva ukuba yintoni esiyenzayo kakuhle.
feedbackPage.name: Igama (Ongakukhetha)
feedbackPage.compliment: Sazise ukuba yintoni eyenze amava akho abe mahle

termAdditions.extContent: Khetha amagama aqinisekiswe ngabaphathi ukuze ongeze njengoguqulelo:
termAdditions.content2: Khetha amagama aqinisekiswe ngabaphathi ukuze ongeze njengoguqulelo:
termAdditions.deleteContent: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima esi sabelo? Eli nyathelo alinakuhlehliswa.

glossaryPage2.agriculture: Amagama achaza ezolimo, ukufuya izilwanyana kunye neenkqubo zemveliso yezolimo.
glossaryPage2.construction: Amagama asetyenziswa kulwakhiwo, izixhobo zokwakha kunye nolawulo lweprojekthi.
glossaryPage2.demography: Amagama aphambili achaza iimpawu zabemi kunye neenkcukacha-manani zentlalo.
glossaryPage2.education: Amagama anxulumene nemfundo, uqeqesho kunye neenkqubo zemfundo.
glossaryPage2.energy: Iingcamango ezinxulumene nemveliso yamandla kunye neenkqubo zamandla.
glossaryPage2.environment: Amagama achaza ukhuseleko lokusingqongileyo, i-ecology, kunye nokuqhubeka kokusingqongileyo.
glossaryPage2.generalDemography: Iinkcukacha-manani ezibanzi zabemi ezibandakanya ubudala, isini, kunye nokufuduka kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.businessEnterprises: Iingcamango ezinxulumene nolawulo lwamashishini, ushishino kunye nemisebenzi yeenkampani.
glossaryPage2.geography: Amagama anxulumene neendawo, imimandla, kunye nokwenza iimephu.
glossaryPage2.healthVitalStats: Iinkcazelo kunye namagama anxulumene nempilo, intlalontle kunye neenkcukacha-manani ezibalulekileyo.
glossaryPage2.householdIncome: Iingcamango ezinxulumene nohlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lwasekhaya, iindleko kunye nemigangatho yokuphila.
glossaryPage2.housingServices: Amagama achaza izindlu, iziseko ezingundoqo kunye neenkonzo ezisisiseko zasedolophini.
glossaryPage2.incomeWealth: Amagama ezomnotho achaza ukusasazwa kwemivuzo, imbuyekezo kunye nempahla yasekhaya.
glossaryPage2.industryTrade: Amagama anxulumene nemveliso, ukuthumela ngaphandle kunye nemveliso yezoqoqosho.
glossaryPage2.labour: Amagama anxulumene nomsebenzi abandakanya abasebenzi, imivuzo kunye nemarike yomsebenzi.
glossaryPage2.lawJustice: Amagama achaza iinkqubo zomthetho, amalungelo kunye nolawulo lobulungisa.
glossaryPage2.manufacturing: Iingcamango ezinxulumene nemveliso yoshishino, iinkqubo zemveliso kunye neenkqubo zokuhanjiswa kwezinto.
glossaryPage2.nationalAccounts: Iimpawu eziphambili zoqoqosho ezifaka i-GDP, ingeniso yelizwe kunye neenkcukacha-manani zezemali.
glossaryPage2.government: Amagama achaza izakhiwo zikarhulumente, ulawulo kunye namaziko oluntu.
glossaryPage2.populationCensus: Amagama anxulumene neCensus yokubala abantu kunye nokuhlalutya ulwazi lwabemi.
glossaryPage2.poverty: Iingcamango kunye neempawu zokulinganisa intlupheko, ukungalingani kunye nophuhliso loluntu.
glossaryPage2.prices: Amagama ezomnotho achaza ixabiso, amaxabiso abathengi kunye namandla okuthenga.
glossaryPage2.privateSector: Amagama achaza amashishini azimeleyo, utyalo-mali kunye nemisebenzi yeenkampani.
glossaryPage2.publicFinance: Amagama achaza uhlahlo-lwabiwo-mali lukarhulumente, irhafu kunye nolawulo lwezimali zoluntu.
glossaryPage2.scienceTech: Iingcamango zesayensi kunye netekhnoloji ezibandakanya uphando kunye nokuqamba okungokutsha.
glossaryPage2.socialConditions: Amagama achaza intlalontle yoluntu, iinkonzo zoluntu kunye neemeko zokuphila.
glossaryPage2.statisticalProcesses: Amagama obuchwephesha achaza imigangatho yezibalo, i-metadata kunye neendlela zokusebenza kwedatha.
glossaryPage2.businessRegisters: Iingcamango ezinxulumene nokugcina kunye nokuhlaziya iirejista zeshishini zikazwelonke.
glossaryPage2.tourism: Amagama achaza ukhenketho, amashishini okuzonwabisa kunye neenkcukacha-manani zabakhenkethi.
glossaryPage2.tourismMigration: Amagama achaza ukuhamba kwabakhenkethi, iindlela zokufuduka kunye nokuhamba kwabantu.
glossaryPage2.trade: Iingcamango ezibandakanya ukuthengwa, ukuthengiswa kunye norhwebo lwamazwe ngamazwe.
glossaryPage2.transportCommunication: Amagama achaza uthutho, iziseko ezingundoqo kunye nemigca yonxibelelwano.
glossaryPage2.loginError: Nceda ungene ukuze ubeke uphawu kwiiglosa.

termHelpPage.title: Ukuqonda Isichazi-magama
termHelpPage.intro: I-Isichazi-magama yindawo apho unokukhangela khona iintsingiselo zamagama ngeelwimi ezininzi phakathi kweelwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika. Iseka ukukhangela ngokukhawuleza, ukuhluza ngokolwimi okanye ngokwesigaba, kunye nokusetyenziswa ngaphandle kwe-intanethi xa izichazi-magama zikhutshelwe ngaphambili.
termHelpPage.overviewBody: Isichazi-magama sikuvumela ukuba ukhangelisise iintsingiselo zamagama ngeelwimi ezininzi phakathi kweelwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika.
termHelpPage.whatIsATermBody: Igama ngalinye kuMarito liquka ezi nkcukacha zilandelayo:

termFields.language: Ulwimi: Olunye lweelwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika.
termFields.related: Amagama Ahlobene: Amakhonkco aya kwamanye amagama anentsingiselo efanayo okanye enxulumene nayo.

termHelpPage.languagesBody: I-Marito ixhasa zonke iilwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika. Ungasebenzisa ukuhluza ukuze ugxile kulwimi olunye okanye uphande amagama kuwo onke.
termHelpPage.searchBody1: Umsebenzi wokukhangela kuMarito ukunceda ukuba ufumane amagama ngokukhawuleza kuyo yonke iilwimi ezilishumi elinanye ezisemthethweni.
termHelpPage.searchBody2: Xa ubhala, iMarito yenza ukukhangela okubukhoma, ibuyekeze iziphumo ngexesha langempela.

searchFields.term: Igama: Ileyibhile okanye ibinzana elimele ingcinga ethile.
searchFields.definition: Inkcazo: Amagama aneentsingiselo eziquka amagama okuphendla nawo aya kubonakala.

termHelpPage.searchLiveBody: I-Marito inokuphakamisa iziphakamiso okanye amagama ahlobene ngexesha obhala ngalo.
termHelpPage.searchSensitivityBody: Ngokungagqibekanga, iMarito yenza ukukhangela okuqinisekileyo okanye kufutshane nokuqinisekileyo, kodwa ukukhangela okungachanekanga nako kungasebenza.
termHelpPage.searchResultBody: Amagama aboniswa kumakhadi aquka igama, ulwimi, icandelo, inkcazo, kunye namaqhosha okuvota.
termHelpPage.filtersBody: Ukunciphisa iziphumo, sebenzisa izihluzi ezikhoyo kwiphepha lokukhangela.

filtersList.language: Ulwimi: Nciphisa iziphumo kulwimi olunye kuphela.
filtersList.domain: Icandelo: Gxila kwimimandla enjengeMfundo, Ezempilo, okanye Ubuchwepheshe.
filtersList.fuzzy: Ukukhangela Okungachanekanga: Fumana amagama nokuba kukho iimpazamo zokupela okanye umahluko.

termHelpPage.viewBody: Cofa iqhosha elithi 'Jonga' kwikhadi legama ukuze uvule inkcazo epheleleyo kwaye uphande amagama ahlobene.
termHelpPage.offlineBody: I-Marito ingasetyenziswa ngaphandle kwe-intanethi ngokukhuphela izichazi-magama kwangaphambili.
termHelpPage.offlineEnd: Emva kokukhuphela, amagama akwesichazi-magama eso aya kuhlala efumaneka nokuba awuxhunyiwanga kwi-intanethi.

leaningPathHelp.title: Ukuqonda Izindlela Zokufunda
leaningPathHelp.section1: Isici se-Learning Path sikuvumela ukuthi ulungise uhambo lokufunda olulawulwayo lokufundela olunye lwezilimi ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika. Ngokukhetha ulimi kanye nezinsiza ofuna ukuzisebenzisa, ungakwazi ukulandela indlela ehlelekile esikhundleni sokuhlola ngokungahleliwe.
leaningPathHelp.section2: Indlela ngayinye yokufunda ihlanganisa amagama, amathuluzi okuzilolonga, kanye nokulandela intuthuko ukuze uhlale ukhuthazekile futhi ube nokuzimisela.
leaningPathHelp.section4: Ngemva kokuba ukhethe ulimi, uzocelwa ukukhetha i-glossary. I-glossary ngayinye ihlelwe ngokwesigaba (Imfundo, Ezempilo, Ubuchwepheshe) ukuze ugxile kumagama abalulekile kuwe.
leaningPathHelp.section5: Uma i-glossary yakho isilungisiwe, ungakhetha indlela ofuna ukufunda ngayo
leaningPathHelp.section7: Phendula imibuzo ukuze uhlolisise ulwazi lwakho futhi uqiniseke ngalokho okufundile.
leaningPathHelp.section9: Sebenzisa amakhadi okufunda ukuze wakhe ukuqonda nokukhumbula amagama ngesivinini sakho.
leaningPathHelp.section12: Learning Path ilandelela umsebenzi wakho ukuze ubone ukuthi usuhambe kangakanani. Inqubekela phambili ikhombiswa kanye nezibalo zomphakathi wakho, ukwenza kube lula ukuhlala ukhuthazekile.
leaningPathHelp.section13: Hlanganisa Izindlela Zokufunda nezinselelo zamasonto kanye nezindondo ukuze uthole amabheji njengoba uthuthukisa amakhono akho olimi.
